title: Cookie Policy
subtitle: We use cookies to improve your experience, personalize content, and analyze traffic on our platform.
essential_desc: These cookies are required for the basic functions of the site such as login and securing the shopping cart. They cannot be disabled.
pref_desc: Allow the site to remember your preferences such as the language you are currently using (Arabic/English) and your time zone.
analytics_desc: Help us understand how merchants interact with MdStore, allowing us to develop more efficient selling tools.
manage_desc: You can manage or clear cookies through your browser settings at any time. Please note that disabling some may affect your platform experience.
